text: How are you trying to access the table? Via a server, or Javascript client?  (in-browser)

I am looking for a way to get the list membership of a company through the api. There is a way to get the contact membership on lists, but where is it for companies? Thanks!

Hello all :hand:

I want to know about limitation of Search API for contacts.
I know <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/search|v3 search API> has limitation that can't query if query result will be  more than 10k records.
but how about <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/search_contacts|v1 contact search API> ?
is it has same limitation ? I can't find any documentation for that.
